section.title: Batch Item
section.para: To reschedule a Batch Item, select the RESCHEDULE button. The following screen will appear:
When rescheduling a Batch Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the name of the user who submitted the Batch Item.
Displays the date and time when the Batch Item was submitted.
Displays the email address—typically belonging to the submitting user—where the Batch Manager will send the Batch Item results once they are completed.
Displays the type of action to be performed when the Batch Item is run.
Displays the source in the application where the Batch Item originated from.
Schedule a date and time to run the Batch Item.
Specify a date in the first field using a standard date format. Use the arrow buttons in the second field to specify a time of day.
Displays the date and time when processing of the Batch Item began.
Displays the date and time when processing of the Batch Item was completed.
Select to reschedule the submitted action on a regular basis.
If you decide to reschedule the action, you may reschedule on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without rescheduling the Batch Item, returning you to the previous screen.
Saves any changes made to the Batch Item schedule.
